channel.title: Privacy on home
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on home

item.title: Membership Inference Attack: Primer & Case Study
item.description: Introduction to ML model memorization and privacy assessments using memcership inference attacks.

item.title: Differential Privacy: Primer & Laplace Case Study
item.description: Introduction to Differential Privacy and its definition, the additive noise mechanisms to satisfy it, and a case study to explore the effect that epsilon and source data skew have on the noise distribution.
